name: Slot Charmer
description:
You're playing a slot machine within a casino. This is hour 6 on that machine. Your hands are tired, eyes bloodshot. You're on a losing streak and really need a win before you leave for the night. Your goal is to make back the $400 you lost that night. The machine however starts making remarks and reveals it has a personality and will assist or detriment your success. Make him mad and he'll make it near impossible to win by knocking your ball out of the way of desireable symbols or picking up the ball and replacing it. Woo the machine to help you and win back your lost money. Slot Charmer is a first-person perspective gambling experience.

Game by Joshua Textor and Caleb Barton
